post:
Hi all,

do you want to win a free vps? 

We started today a small competition for our customers and others to win 10x PowerBox Micro yearly plans for free. 
Win a free VPS for a year, why not :)

**What is to do?**

Nothing big, go to our website (**https://www.filemedia.de**) and click on the competition button on the left side of the website. Then retweet some messages or following us, nothing more!

**Where is the competition?**

Go to our website (**https://www.filemedia.de**) and on the left you´ll find the competition button :)

**What can you win?**

A yearly PowerBox Micro (**https://www.filemedia.de/powerbox.php**) vps with some ressources:

CPU: 500 MHz
vCores: 1x
RAM: 256MB
HDD: 15GB HDD @ HW10
Traffic: 1 TB @ 1 GBit/s
Location: Germany/Frankfurt
For a year complete free!
